title: Senior Professor. International College, SIAM University
description: Senior Professor, International College, SIAM University, Bangkok, August 2025-up to now

title: Chief Guest. MSc in Agroecology Inauguration
description: The Chief Guest at the inauguration of the first Master of Science in Agroecology in Sri Lanka by the Department of Agricultural Systems, Rajarata University of Sri Lanka on 30th November 2024. The curriculum was developed while I was the academic coordinator of this degree program in 2021, before becoming the Vice Chancellor of the university.

title: Field Observation with MSc Agroecology Students, Kalpitiya
description: Field visit with Master’s students following Agroecology, observing crop farming practices in Kalpitiya.

title: VAPA TV Program – Research for National Development
description: How are the research findings used for the development of a country?” VAPA Television Program on 13th May 2025.

title: Field Classes with Final Year Students. RUSL
description: Conducted field classes with final year students of the Faculty of Agriculture, Rajarata University of Sri Lanka.

title: PhD in Agricultural Systems and Engineering
description: Graduated with a PhD in Agricultural Systems and Engineering from the Asian Institute of Technology, Thailand.

title: Professor of Agricultural Systems. Rajarata University
description: Served as Lecturer Probationary (2001–2007), Senior Lecturer (2008–2019), and Professor (from January 2019) at Rajarata University of Sri Lanka.

title: Supporting Organic Farmers – Nochchiyagama
description: Participated in an Agricultural Systems family visit supporting organic farmers in Nochchiyagama.
